items.title: Kids' Tennis
items.description: Parents, are your kids getting stir-crazy? Sign your 5-8 year-olds up for a four-week kids' tennis clinic. They'll learn the basics and get a free t-shirt and racquet! Cost is $25.

items.title: Kids
items.description: We offer kid-safe and age-specific environments for kids birth-5th grade during all weekend services. Just stop by one of the Children’s Welcome Desks and we’ll get your kiddos checked in and ready to roll!

items.title: New Here
items.description: You fit in here Really, you do. Find out what’s going on around here so you can find out how. There’s a group, a class, an event…something just for you. This church thing really is more fun together. Kids Students Men Women

items.title: Church Life
items.description: You fit in here Really, you do. Find out what’s going on around here so you can find out how. There’s a group, a class, an event…something just for you. This church thing really is more fun together. Kids Students Men Women

items.title: Next Steps
items.description: Membership It’s more like a member of the body of Christ and less like a membership to Sam’s Club. Membership isn’t admittance to the cool kids’ club, given rights, anonymity or a temporary investment…

items.title: God Cuts a Covenant
items.description: When God made grand promises to Abraham, he initially doubted and couldn’t see how they’d be fulfilled. God makes a covenant, or a promise, with Abraham and it tells us much about God’s nature and what it means to trust him…
